MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The place where we heard the noise is at the far end of the studio, a room that is smaller than the others and has a sense of life. But there is no sign of the designer.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's strange. I'm sure I heard it coming from over here.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Designer, it's me. I'm Pancras, from the panty-spondences.
Pancras calls out, looking for a place they might be hiding. But no reply comes back. And then the closet in the corner shakes for a moment.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You're there. I was worried about your health, so I came to check on you. You aren't sick in any way...are you?
There is no reply to those words either. But after watching for a while, a note comes out from a crack. On it is written, "I'm at my limit with making panties."

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Most of the panties I've seen before are made of bold materials,
but you're not happy with any of them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm sure you're the only one who understands this agony. But I liked all the panties you delivered to me so far. You have a wonderful sensibility. You mustn't give up.

Pancras' words bring out another note from the crevices of the closet. On it is written that the they feel the burden of wanting to tell everyone the true charm of women's panties, but being unable to do so.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I think it's a really great idea to tell everyone~

Muttering to herself as she chews on the designer's words,
Pancras takes a slow breath.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I believe that what you wear must accentuate your charm.
It's not only dresses and accessories, but also underwear.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Especially underwear, which is the closest thing to your skin.
It's the first thing that shapes who you are.
Pancras is taking care of her own panties by calling them the Pancras Collection. It sounds very compelling.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I can tell you feel strongly about your panties and that you don't want them to be just a consumable. The way they fit and the way they show off my curves are always perfect, no matter what kind of panties I wear.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: If that part of the panties is perfectly made, then all you have to do is put your feelings into the rest of process and you'll have the best panties ever. I can assure you because I've worn them up to this point.

At Pancras' feverish words, the closet slowly opens.
And out from inside emerges a female designer.
Do you think I can make the best panties?
Pancras smiles gently at the woman's words.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Of course.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: See, your buddy the bird says so, too.
When Pancras opens the window, the bird that led us here comes in and perches on the designer's shoulder. Then it rubs its head happily against her cheek.
When we leave the studio, there is a pleasant breeze blowing. Pancras looks very happy and occasionally looks back at me. I'm so glad the designer is back on her feet.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah. I'm sure she'll make the best panties ever next time.
When she says that, Pancras, who was looking back, stops in her tracks. When I follow her gaze, I see that countless panties are being blown away by the wind from the roof of the studio.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I think it's a way of mourning for her past failures and her broken heart.
I'm sure it's a necessary ritual for her to move on.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
And yet, this scene...
A panty storm is just as elegant and beautiful as a flower storm.

No, from a neighborhood standpoint,
panties falling seems to be a pretty big problem...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
The whole neighborhood, including the residents,
will soon fall in love with the designer.
Muttering confidently, Pancras grabs a flying fail-panty and smiles.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Thank you, Conductor.
I hope you'll join me to see the new ones when they arrive.

...Days later, the designer sends a new pair of underwear to Pancras via panty-spondence. It's accompanied by a pair of men's underwear made of women's material with the words, "Bring the charm of women's underwear to all people!"

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Conductor, Conductor!
I'm sure this is a new style made in your image. I'm sure of it.

In fact, when I see the drafting of her latest work would be,
I knew it would be men's underwear, but I can't bear to tell Pancras...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Pancras
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Try these on now.
I'll have to send some feedback as soon as I can.

Pancras comes at me with the pair of men's underwear.
I can't help but run away, but Pancras' passion is not to be underestimated.

The memory of being chased around
and asked for my impression is sealed by a modicum of fear and shame.
